name: Tempo Trigger
description:
Tempo Trigger is a rhythm and aiming skill game. Enjoy your music library in new ways, or produce something truly "unique" with your stream's chat.

Features

  • Harness the power of democracy by letting chat pick your music
  • Witness chat create new music on the fly
  • Embrace true chaos when chat directly influences your gameplay
  • Not a streamer? Connect to your favorite content creator's chat to compete with them real-time
  • Compete in the leaderboard for ultimate bragging rights
  • Consecutively hit targets to earn powerful abilities
